column2: an A.M. Eatery////Popped in for a late breakfast during my first visit to Houston. Amazing! The wait wasn't bad
column3: about twenty minutes for me. I had a hot chocolate
column6: and the pancakes flight. The plain and sweet potato pancakes were killer. And the hot chocolate was the best I've ever had. Oh
column7: and my server was awesome. Will definitely be back.
